channel.title: Command codes. (Dodain)
channel.description:
I'm having trouble making spacific commands. I'd really appreciate it if you guys could help me out here. The following commands are what I need:
~ Admin crown toggle (hide/show) - admin only. ~ An invisable command (turns the player invisable) - admin only. ~ Constant noclip - admin only ~ ::kill [username] - admin only
Thanks guys! Oh, and if it helps, i'm useing dodian as a soruce.
Spacificly, the admin toggle. I was thinking that I could like, change my player rights from in-game. Because player rights 4 is admin without the crown. So, ::hide would turn my player rights to 4, and ::show would turn my player rights to 3. So could someone just turn that into computer junk or something?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 01, 2007, 01:59:45 PM[/size][hr]Please help?

item.title: Command codes. (Dodain)
item.dc:creator: @Honest_Truth Honest Truth
item.description:
@Honest_Truth wrote:

I’m having trouble making spacific commands. I’d really appreciate it if you guys could help me out here. The following commands are what I need:

~ Admin crown toggle (hide/show) - admin only.
~ An invisable command (turns the player invisable) - admin only.
~ Constant noclip - admin only
~ ::kill [username] - admin only

Thanks guys! Oh, and if it helps, i’m useing dodian as a soruce.

Spacificly, the admin toggle. I was thinking that I could like, change my player rights from in-game. Because player rights 4 is admin without the crown. So, ::hide would turn my player rights to 4, and ::show would turn my player rights to 3. So could someone just turn that into computer junk or something?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 01, 2007, 01:59:45 PM[/size][hr]Please help?
